title: Oh Bite It!'s Grilled Cheese Crust Pizza
directions: Lay one of the pizza crusts onto the pizza pan, and trim up the edges so it leaves a circular 1-inch border around the pan.
In a small bowl, combine the egg and butter. Mix until blended and set aside.

Layer the cheese slices onto the dough. Place the other pizza crust on top of the cheese and trim it to fit. Turn up the edges to form a crust around the pizza and brush it generously with the butter-egg mixture. Bake at 350 degrees F for approximately 15 minutes until golden brown.
Top with tomato sauce, oregano, mozzarella cheese and bake for 10 more minutes until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 2 containers of Pillsbury thin crust pizza dough
Dash of Oregano or Italian seasoning
